text: (upbeat music)

- Why AWS, I think AWS is
the most innovative company
on the planet today.

- You're learning something
new like every day.

That is the one thing
that really excites me
about working at AWS.

- From day one, you get
to interact with customers

from across the globe and at a
scale which is unprecedented.

- Amazon's big and we
have a lot of resources

but really what separates us
is we're looking for people
that want to add to the playbook here.
- There's always support for you.

No, one's going to say
no to helping you out

because making you better
helps make the team better.

- There's such a huge culture
at Amazon and AWS in general.
Between the affinity groups that we have,
the networking groups that we have,
there's a way to be connected.

- We have a lot of fun here
and we work really hard

and those two together
make a great environment.
- If you want to really challenge yourself
to take your career to the next level,
I definitely recommend AWS.
